newsitem.title: UK: Timah at 17.9 in London at 0926 GMT.
newsitem.headline: Timah at 17.9 in London at 0926 GMT.

text.p: PT Tambang Timah was traded at $17.9 per GDR in London on Friday at around 0926 GMT.
It recorded a low of $17.875 and a high of $17.9.
Its previous close on Thursday was $17.700.
One Global Depository Receipt represents 10 common shares.
